this_title: Trick or Treat - Halloween night home alone
introduction: Home alone on a Halloween night with trick or treat? We made this short film on the Halloween and Diwali theme. We enjoyed making this short film in 10 hours on a single day and shot some other B rolls on a separate day. It took me a week to edit and put together the sound and music design. Hope you like it as much as we enjoyed making this little spooky story with a twist. The 'revival' is the fact that there was no ghost but illusions playing on the child's mind and revelation at the end that it was the parents playing a prank.I used mostly one light source, close to the subject, used Canon M50 EFM 22 and 50Mm on a tripod or hand held and for exterior shot, I used my Zhyuin Webill gimbal with the EFM 22 and natural light. Entire audio design is done in post.
